properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHRER (BOARD_TYPE = 1) AND STATUS="Y"
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NICKNAME, B.ADDRESS, B.CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS='Y'
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, 1, ?,?,2)
